name: Leads This Month
description: Surpass your lead acquisition targets! Track the number leads you have this month and compare to the previous month. Originates from the Gallery.

salesforce-01.name: Leads Previous Month
salesforce-01.description: Leads for last month. Originates from the Gallery.

props.SOQLQuery:
SELECT Company, Name, Email, Status, CreatedDate, Owner.Alias
FROM Lead
WHERE CreatedDate = LAST_MONTH

salesforce-02.name: Leads Current Month
salesforce-02.description: Leads for current month. Originates from the Gallery.

props.SOQLQuery:
SELECT Company, Name, Email, Status, CreatedDate,Owner.Alias
FROM Lead
WHERE CreatedDate = THIS_MONTH
